links.title: Jump on the Host in Turbonomic ARM UI

options.content:
The Host is currently $HOST_STATE.

Name Cluster Datacenter Target Name Target Type
${HOST} ${HOST_CLUSTER} ${HOST_DATACENTER} ${TARGET_NAME} ${TARGET_TYPE}

Model Number of CPUs CPU Model Quantity of Memory (Gb)
${HOST_MODEL} ${HOST_NUM_CPUS} ${HOST_CPU_MODEL} ${HOST_MEMORY_CURGBCAPACITY}

targets.rawSql:
select e.name from "scope" s
join entity e on s.scoped_oid = e.oid
where s.seed_oid = $HOST_OID
and s.scoped_type = 'GROUP'
and s.finish >= $__timeTo()
order by e.name

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  "type" as metric,
  utilization as value
FROM metric
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  (type = 'CPU' or type = 'MEM') AND
  entity_oid = $HOST_OID
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  utilization as value,
  "type" as metric
FROM metric
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  (type IN ('CPU_READY','Q1_VCPU','Q2_VCPU','Q4_VCPU','Q8_VCPU','Q16_VCPU','Q32_VCPU','Q64_VCPU')) AND
  entity_oid = $HOST_OID
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  utilization as value,
  "type" as metric
FROM metric
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  (type IN ('SWAPPING','BALLOONING')) AND
  entity_oid = $HOST_OID
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  consumed
FROM metric
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  type = 'STORAGE_LATENCY' AND
  entity_oid = $HOST_OID
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  consumed
FROM metric
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  type = 'STORAGE_ACCESS' AND
  entity_oid = $HOST_OID
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  utilization
FROM metric
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  type = 'IO_THROUGHPUT' AND
  entity_oid = $HOST_OID
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  utilization
FROM metric
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  type = 'NET_THROUGHPUT' AND
  entity_oid = $HOST_OID
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  recommendation_time AS "time",
  count(type) as value,
  CONCAT(category,' - ',type) as metric
FROM pending_action
WHERE
  involved_entities @> '{"$HOST_OID"}'
GROUP BY 1, 3
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  recommendation_time AS "Time",
  description AS "Description"
FROM pending_action
WHERE
  (category = 'PERFORMANCE_ASSURANCE' OR category = 'PREVENTION') AND
  involved_entities @> '{"$HOST_OID"}'
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  recommendation_time AS "Time",
  description AS "Description"
FROM pending_action
WHERE
  (category = 'EFFICIENCY_IMPROVEMENT') AND
  involved_entities @> '{"$HOST_OID"}'
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  recommendation_time AS "Time",
  description AS "Description"
FROM pending_action
WHERE
  (category = 'COMPLIANCE') AND
  involved_entities @> '{"$HOST_OID"}'
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  recommendation_time AS "Time",
  description AS "Description"
FROM pending_action
WHERE
  (category = 'PERFORMANCE_ASSURANCE' OR category = 'PREVENTION') AND
  involved_entities @> '{"$HOST_OID"}'
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  recommendation_time AS "Time",
  description AS "Description"
FROM pending_action
WHERE
  category = 'EFFICIENCY_IMPROVEMENT' AND
  involved_entities @> '{"$HOST_OID"}'
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  recommendation_time AS "Time",
  description AS "Description"
FROM pending_action
WHERE
  category = 'COMPLIANCE' AND
  involved_entities @> '{"$HOST_OID"}'
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  description AS "Description",
  acceptance_time AS "Acceptance Time",
  recommendation_time as "Recommendation Time",
  final_state as "Final State",
  "type" as "Type",
  category as "Category",
  savings as "Savings"
FROM completed_action
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("acceptance_time") AND
  involved_entities @> '{"$HOST_OID"}'
ORDER BY acceptance_time DESC

select distinct
	e.oid as "OID",
	e.name as "Name",
	TO_CHAR(e.first_seen, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm:ss') as "First seen",
	CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(e.last_seen, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm:ss') = '31/12/9999 12:12:00' THEN 'Still present' ELSE TO_CHAR(e.last_seen, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm:ss') END  as "Last seen"
from scope s 
join entity e on s.scoped_oid = e."oid" 
where s.seed_oid = $HOST_OID
and s.scoped_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
and
  (
    (s.start <= $__timeFrom() and s.finish <= $__timeTo()) or
    (s.start >= $__timeFrom() and s.finish <= $__timeTo()) or
    (s.start >= $__timeFrom() and s.finish >= $__timeTo()) or
    (s.start <= $__timeFrom() and s.finish >= $__timeTo())
  )
and s.finish >= $__timeFrom()
and s.start <= $__timeTo()
order by e.name

select distinct
	e.oid as "OID",
	m."type" as "Type",
	coalesce(avg(m.utilization), avg(m.consumed))	as "Utilization"
from scope s 
join entity e on s.scoped_oid = e."oid" 
join metric m on m.entity_oid = e."oid" AND $__timeFilter(m.time)
where s.seed_oid = $HOST_OID
and s.scoped_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
and
  (
    (s.start <= $__timeFrom() and s.finish <= $__timeTo()) or
    (s.start >= $__timeFrom() and s.finish <= $__timeTo()) or
    (s.start >= $__timeFrom() and s.finish >= $__timeTo()) or
    (s.start <= $__timeFrom() and s.finish >= $__timeTo())
  )
and s.finish >= $__timeFrom()
and s.start <= $__timeTo()
and m."type" IN ('VCPU')
group by e.oid, m.type

select distinct
	e.oid as "OID",
	m."type" as "Type",
	coalesce(avg(m.utilization), avg(m.consumed))	as "Utilization"
from scope s 
join entity e on s.scoped_oid = e."oid" 
join metric m on m.entity_oid = e."oid" AND $__timeFilter(m.time)
where s.seed_oid = $HOST_OID
and s.scoped_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
and
  (
    (s.start <= $__timeFrom() and s.finish <= $__timeTo()) or
    (s.start >= $__timeFrom() and s.finish <= $__timeTo()) or
    (s.start >= $__timeFrom() and s.finish >= $__timeTo()) or
    (s.start <= $__timeFrom() and s.finish >= $__timeTo())
  )
and s.finish >= $__timeFrom()
and s.start <= $__timeTo()
and m."type" IN ('VMEM')
group by e.oid, m.type

select distinct
	e.oid as "OID",
	m."type" as "Type",
	coalesce(avg(m.utilization), avg(m.consumed))	as "Utilization"
from scope s 
join entity e on s.scoped_oid = e."oid" 
join metric m on m.entity_oid = e."oid" AND $__timeFilter(m.time)
where s.seed_oid = $HOST_OID
and s.scoped_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
and
  (
    (s.start <= $__timeFrom() and s.finish <= $__timeTo()) or
    (s.start >= $__timeFrom() and s.finish <= $__timeTo()) or
    (s.start >= $__timeFrom() and s.finish >= $__timeTo()) or
    (s.start <= $__timeFrom() and s.finish >= $__timeTo())
  )
and s.finish >= $__timeFrom()
and s.start <= $__timeTo()
and m."type" IN ('CPU_READY')
group by e.oid, m.type

select distinct
	e.oid as "OID",
	m."type" as "Type",
	coalesce(avg(m.utilization), avg(m.consumed))	as "Utilization"
from scope s 
join entity e on s.scoped_oid = e."oid" 
join metric m on m.entity_oid = e."oid" AND $__timeFilter(m.time)
where s.seed_oid = $HOST_OID
and s.scoped_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
and
  (
    (s.start <= $__timeFrom() and s.finish <= $__timeTo()) or
    (s.start >= $__timeFrom() and s.finish <= $__timeTo()) or
    (s.start >= $__timeFrom() and s.finish >= $__timeTo()) or
    (s.start <= $__timeFrom() and s.finish >= $__timeTo())
  )
and s.finish >= $__timeFrom()
and s.start <= $__timeTo()
and m."type" IN ('IO_THROUGHPUT')
group by e.oid, m.type

select distinct
	e.oid as "OID",
	m."type" as "Type",
	coalesce(avg(m.utilization), avg(m.consumed))	as "Utilization"
from scope s 
join entity e on s.scoped_oid = e."oid" 
join metric m on m.entity_oid = e."oid" AND $__timeFilter(m.time)
where s.seed_oid = $HOST_OID
and s.scoped_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
and
  (
    (s.start <= $__timeFrom() and s.finish <= $__timeTo()) or
    (s.start >= $__timeFrom() and s.finish <= $__timeTo()) or
    (s.start >= $__timeFrom() and s.finish >= $__timeTo()) or
    (s.start <= $__timeFrom() and s.finish >= $__timeTo())
  )
and s.finish >= $__timeFrom()
and s.start <= $__timeTo()
and m."type" IN ('NET_THROUGHPUT')
group by e.oid, m.type

list.definition: select name from entity where type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE' order by 1
list.label: Host
list.name: HOST
list.query: select name from entity where type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE' order by 1

list.definition: select oid from entity where name = '$HOST' and type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE' order by last_seen DESC limit 1
list.name: HOST_OID
list.query: select oid from entity where name = '$HOST' and type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE' order by last_seen DESC limit 1

list.definition:
SELECT
CASE WHEN int_value::entity_state = 'POWERED_ON' THEN 'Powered On' 
ELSE 'Powered Off'
END
FROM historical_entity_attrs
WHERE entity_oid = $HOST_OID
AND type = 'ENTITY_STATE'
ORDER by time DESC limit 1
list.name: HOST_STATE
list.query:
SELECT
CASE WHEN int_value::entity_state = 'POWERED_ON' THEN 'Powered On' 
ELSE 'Powered Off'
END
FROM historical_entity_attrs
WHERE entity_oid = $HOST_OID
AND type = 'ENTITY_STATE'
ORDER by time DESC limit 1

list.definition:
select e."name" 
from "scope" s
join entity e on e.oid = s.scoped_oid 
where seed_oid = $HOST_OID
and scoped_type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
and finish > now()
list.name: HOST_CLUSTER
list.query:
select e."name" 
from "scope" s
join entity e on e.oid = s.scoped_oid 
where seed_oid = $HOST_OID
and scoped_type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
and finish > now()

list.definition:
select e."name" 
from "scope" s
join entity e on e.oid = s.scoped_oid 
where seed_oid = $HOST_OID
and scoped_type = 'DATACENTER'
and finish > now()
list.name: HOST_DATACENTER
list.query:
select e."name" 
from "scope" s
join entity e on e.oid = s.scoped_oid 
where seed_oid = $HOST_OID
and scoped_type = 'DATACENTER'
and finish > now()

list.definition: select attrs->>'model' from entity e where oid = $HOST_OID
list.name: HOST_MODEL
list.query: select attrs->>'model' from entity e where oid = $HOST_OID

list.definition: select attrs->>'cpu_model' from entity e where oid = $HOST_OID
list.name: HOST_CPU_MODEL
list.query: select attrs->>'cpu_model' from entity e where oid = $HOST_OID

list.definition: select attrs->>'num_cpus' from entity e where oid = $HOST_OID
list.name: HOST_NUM_CPUS
list.query: select attrs->>'num_cpus' from entity e where oid = $HOST_OID

list.definition:
select round(capacity/1024/1024) from metric
where entity_oid = $HOST_OID
and type = 'MEM'
ORDER by time DESC limit 1
list.name: HOST_MEMORY_CURGBCAPACITY
list.query:
select round(capacity/1024/1024) from metric
where entity_oid = $HOST_OID
and type = 'MEM'
ORDER by time DESC limit 1
